revision.text:
{{Talk header}}{{ArticleHistory |action1=GAN |action1date=18:35, 3 October 2010 |action1link=Talk:Caernarfon Castle/GA1 |action1result=listed |action1oldid=388511522 |action2=GTC |action2date=18:20, 19 February 2013 (UTC) |action2link=Wikipedia:Featured topic candidates/Castles and Town Walls of King Edward in Gwynedd/archive1 |action2result=promoted |ftname=Castles and Town Walls of King Edward in Gwynedd |currentstatus=GA |topic=War }} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Military history|class=GA |B-Class-1= yes |B-Class-2= yes |B-Class-3= yes |B-Class-4= yes |B-Class-5= yes |British-task-force=yes |Fortifications-task-force=yes |Technology-task-force=yes|Medieval-task-force=yes}} {{WikiProject Architecture|class=GA|importance=high}} {{WikiProject Wales|class=GA|importance=high}} {{WikiProject Middle Ages|class=GA|importance=}} {{WikiProject World Heritage Sites|class=GA}} }} ==Caernarfon castle or Caernarfon Castle?== There's another article at [[Caernarfon castle]]. You might want to merge the two or something. -[[User:Nommonomanac|Nommo]] — Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|undated]] comment added 12:53, 3 July 2003 (UTC) :I've done it instead. More stuff linked to this version, so I've put it all here. -[[User:Nommonomanac|Nommo]] — Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|undated]] comment added 15:47, 3 July 2003 (UTC) =="legend states"== ::: A Winner of the August 2004 '''West Dakota Prize''' ''This entry has won the '''West Dakota Prize''' for successfully employing the expression "''legend states''" in a complete sentence.
'''A Winner of the March 2005 West Dakota Prize'''
''This entry is one of only seventeen that have won the March 2005 '''West Dakota Prize''' for successfully employing the expression "'''legend states'''" in a complete sentence.'' --[[User:Wetman|Wetman]] 08:25, 6 Mar 2005 (UTC) == Castle Dimensions == What are the castle's dimensions? —Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[User:151.199.41.135|151.199.41.135]] ([[User talk:151.199.41.135|talk]] • [[Special:Contributions/151.199.41.135|contribs]]) 14:27, 22 January 2006 (UTC) == Roman Fort == My recollection was that the Roman fort was on a different site, near the town, rather than literally on the same site (as the article says). I may be wrong and am thereofre not altering the article. [[User:Peterkingiron|Peterkingiron]] ([[User talk:Peterkingiron|talk]]) 09:31, 5 April 2008 (UTC) You're correct. The fort is about a mile to the south. The article should make this clearer. Mei 15:09, 28 October 2009 (UTC) —Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[User:Meigwil|Meigwil]] ([[User talk:Meigwil|talk]] • [[Special:Contributions/Meigwil|contribs]]) ==Image copyright problem with Image:Charles investiture.jpg== The image [[:Image:Charles investiture.jpg]] is used in this article under a claim of [[WP:NFC|fair use]], but it does not have an adequate explanation for why it meets the [[WP:NFCC|requirements for such images]] when used here. In particular, for each page the image is used on, it must have an [[Wikipedia:Non-free use rationale guideline|explanation]] linking to that page which explains why it needs to be used on that page. Please check :* That there is a [[Wikipedia:Non-free use rationale guideline|non-free use rationale]] on the image's description page for the use in this article. :* That this article is linked to from the image description page. This is an automated notice by [[User:FairuseBot|FairuseBot]]. For assistance on the image use policy, see [[Wikipedia:Media copyright questions]]. --21:22, 19 May 2008 (UTC) == Caer Myrddin? == Never heard of this before. I have reverted the edit (made on 1/11/09). This should be in the [[Caernarfon]] article anyway. Please provide references if you want to include the quote. [[User:Meigwil|Mei]] ([[User talk:Meigwil|talk]]) 19:59, 3 November 2009 (UTC) {{Talk:Caernarfon Castle/GA1}} ==Towards FAC== I had been planning to take this article to FAC, however after consulting a [http://www.gatehouse-gazetteer.info/Welshsites/90.html bibliography on Caernarfon] to see what was missing, the following book seems essential if the article is to satisfy [[WP:FA?|criterion 1c]]: {{citation |last=Williams |first=Diane |title=The Impact of the Edwardian Castles in Wales |year=2009 |publisher=Oxbow Books |isbn=978-1842173800}}. While the books by Arnold Taylor currently used in the article certainly cover the main points on the subject, the volume edited by Williams would seem to include the latest research on Caernarfon and should probably be consulted before this article goes further. Unfortunately, I do not have access to the book so for the time being Caernarfon Castle will not be visiting [[WP:FAC]]. [[User:Nev1|Nev1]] ([[User talk:Nev1|talk]]) 18:37, 3 October 2010 (UTC)
